page.title: 11HEALTH:BADINGHAM/DENNINGTON
page.content: Badingham & Dennington are served by a practice of 3 doctors about 3 miles away in Framlingham.Each gives 2 hours daily of consultation on weekdays. Home visits are made when necessary, also by the District Nurse, Midwife & Health Visitor, who can be contacted through the modern, purpose-built surgery. This is well-appointed throughout & is equipped for minor surgery. A receptionist & pharmacist are on duty & prescriptions are dispensed to non-Framlingham people. The lady doctor runs a weekly well- woman clinic for cervical smears, breast examination & family planning advice; the District Nurse a weekly immunisation clinic; the Midwife antenatal relaxation classes & the Health Visitor a baby clinic, both fortnightly. A social worker attends weekly at surgery.
